Container.Name: Wekan
Container.Overview: Wekan is an open-source and collaborative kanban board application https://wekan.io/ . This template has to be used with the MongoDB-wekan in my repo, if renaming the database change the --link "MongoDB-wekan:db" in Extra Parameters in Advanced View

DateInstalled.Description: Wekan is an open-source and collaborative kanban board application https://wekan.io/ . This template has to be used with the MongoDB-wekan in my repo, if renaming the database change the --link "MongoDB-wekan:db" in Extra Parameters in Advanced View

Config.Name: Varible ROOT_URL
Config.Description: Ipadress and port chosen for the Wekan site/server, change to your setup. It is for the internal working of the board. ex. http://127.0.0.1:80

Config.Name: Variable MAIL_URL
Config.Description: Set your smtp server ex. (If using Gmail) smtp://address@gmail.com:pwd@smtp.gmail.com:465/

Config.Name: Variable MAIL_FROM
Config.Description: Who to send the mail from ex. wekan address@gmail.com
